verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> on the first <S%G1520><s%> [day] of the week <S%G4521><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> early <S%G4404><s%> to the tomb, <S%G3419><s%> while it was still <S%G2089><s%> dark, <S%G4653><s%> and saw <S%G991><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> [already] taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from the tomb. <S%G3419><s%>

And so <S%G3767><s%> she ran <S%G5143><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and to the other <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved, <S%G5368><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "They have taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> out of the tomb, <S%G3419><s%> and we do not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> they have laid <S%G5087><s%> Him."
Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and the other <S%G243><s%> disciple, <S%G3101><s%> and they were going <S%G2064><s%> to the tomb. <S%G3419><s%>

And the two <S%G1417><s%> were running <S%G5143><s%> together; <S%G3674><s%> and the other <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> ran <S%G4390><s%> ahead <S%G4390><s%> faster <S%G5036><s%> than Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to the tomb <S%G3419><s%> first; <S%G4413><s%>
and stooping <S%G3879><s%> and looking <S%G3879><s%> in, he saw <S%G991><s%> the linen <S%G3608><s%> wrappings <S%G3608><s%> lying <S%G2749><s%> [there;] but he did not go <S%G1525><s%> in.

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> following <S%G190><s%> him, and entered <S%G1525><s%> the tomb; <S%G3419><s%> and he beheld <S%G2334><s%> the linen <S%G3608><s%> wrappings <S%G3608><s%> lying <S%G2749><s%> [there,]

and the face-cloth, which <S%G3739><s%> had been <S%G1510><s%> on His head, <S%G2776><s%> not lying <S%G2749><s%> with the linen <S%G3608><s%> wrappings, <S%G3608><s%> but rolled <S%G1794><s%> up in a place <S%G5117><s%> by itself. <S%G5565><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> the other <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> who had first <S%G4413><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to the tomb <S%G3419><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> and he saw <S%G3708><s%> and believed. <S%G4100><s%>
For as yet <S%G3764><s%> they did not understand <S%G3609><s%> the Scripture, <S%G1124><s%> that He must <S%G1163><s%> rise <S%G450><s%> again <S%G450><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>
So <S%G3767><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to their own <S%G1438><s%> homes. <S%G848><s%>

But Mary <S%G3137><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> the tomb <S%G3419><s%> weeping; <S%G2799><s%> and so, <S%G3767><s%> as she wept, <S%G2799><s%> she stooped <S%G3879><s%> and looked <S%G3879><s%> into the tomb; <S%G3419><s%>

and she beheld <S%G2334><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> sitting, <S%G2516><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> at the head, <S%G2776><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> at the feet, <S%G4228><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had been lying. <S%G2749><s%>

And they said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> are you weeping <S%G2799><s%>?" She said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Because <S%G3754><s%> they have taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> my Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and I do not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> they have laid <S%G5087><s%> Him."

When she had said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> she turned <S%G4762><s%> around, <S%G3694><s%> and beheld <S%G2334><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> [there,] and did not know <S%G3609><s%> that it was Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> are you weeping <S%G2799><s%>? Whom <S%G5101><s%> are you seeking <S%G2212><s%>?" Supposing <S%G1380><s%> Him to be the gardener, <S%G2780><s%> she said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Sir, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you have carried <S%G941><s%> Him away, <S%G941><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> me where <S%G4226><s%> you have laid <S%G5087><s%> Him, and I will take <S%G142><s%> Him away. <S%G142><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Mary! <S%G3137><s%>" She turned <S%G4762><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him in Hebrew, <S%G1447><s%> "Rabboni! <S%G4462><s%>" (which <S%G3739><s%> means, <S%G3004><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%>).

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Stop <S%G3361><s%> clinging <S%G681><s%> to Me, for I have not yet <S%G3768><s%> ascended <S%G305><s%> to the Father; <S%G3962><s%> but go <S%G4198><s%> to My brethren, <S%G80><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to them, 'I ascend <S%G305><s%> to My Father <S%G3962><s%> and your Father, <S%G3962><s%> and My God <S%G2316><s%> and your God. <S%G2316><s%>'"

Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> announcing <S%G7000><s%> to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "I have seen <S%G3708><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%>" and [that] He had said <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> to her.

When therefore <S%G3767><s%> it was evening, <S%G3798><s%> on that day, <S%G2250><s%> the first <S%G1520><s%> [day] of the week, <S%G4521><s%> and when the doors <S%G2374><s%> were shut <S%G2808><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> were, for fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and stood <S%G2476><s%> in their midst, <S%G3319><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Peace <S%G1515><s%> [be] with you."

And when He had said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> He showed <S%G1166><s%> them both <S%G2532><s%> His hands <S%G5495><s%> and His side. <S%G4125><s%> The disciples <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> when they saw <S%G3708><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them again, <S%G3825><s%> "Peace <S%G1515><s%> [be] with you; as the Father <S%G3962><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> Me, I also <S%G2532><s%> send <S%G3992><s%> you."
And when He had said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> He breathed <S%G1720><s%> on them, and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Receive <S%G2983><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

"If <S%G302><s%> you forgive <S%G863><s%> the sins <S%G266><s%> of any, <S%G5100><s%> [their sins] have been forgiven <S%G863><s%> them; if <S%G302><s%> you retain <S%G2902><s%> the [sins] of any, <S%G5100><s%> they have been retained. <S%G2902><s%>"
But Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> was not with them when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came. <S%G2064><s%>

The other <S%G243><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> were saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, "We have seen <S%G3708><s%> the Lord! <S%G2962><s%>" But he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I shall see <S%G3708><s%> in His hands <S%G5495><s%> the imprint <S%G5179><s%> of the nails, <S%G2247><s%> and put <S%G906><s%> my finger <S%G1147><s%> into the place <S%G5117><s%> of the nails, <S%G2247><s%> and put <S%G906><s%> my hand <S%G5495><s%> into His side, <S%G4125><s%> I will not believe. <S%G4100><s%>"

And after <S%G3326><s%> eight <S%G3638><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> were inside, <S%G2080><s%> and Thomas <S%G2381><s%> with them. Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> the doors <S%G2374><s%> having been shut, <S%G2808><s%> and stood <S%G2476><s%> in their midst, <S%G3319><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Peace <S%G1515><s%> [be] with you."

Then <S%G1534><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> "Reach <S%G5342><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> your finger, <S%G1147><s%> and see <S%G3708><s%> My hands; <S%G5495><s%> and reach <S%G5342><s%> here your hand, <S%G5495><s%> and put <S%G906><s%> it into My side; <S%G4125><s%> and be not unbelieving, <S%G571><s%> but believing. <S%G4103><s%>"
Thomas <S%G2381><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "My Lord <S%G2962><s%> and my God! <S%G2316><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Because <S%G3754><s%> you have seen <S%G3708><s%> Me, have you believed <S%G4100><s%>? Blessed <S%G3107><s%> [are] they who did not see, <S%G3708><s%> and [yet] believed. <S%G4100><s%>"

Many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G243><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> performed <S%G4160><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are not written <S%G1125><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> book; <S%G975><s%>

but these <S%G3778><s%> have been written <S%G1125><s%> that you may believe <S%G4100><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and that believing <S%G4100><s%> you may have <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in His name. <S%G3686><s%>
